row._tooltip: This staff is purely for holding marks that should appear once at the top of the system - avoiding having to put the marks in each part. It must have a blank part name, so that it is typeset with every part. The marks should be spaced using either dummy notes or spacers.\nWARNING: Do not start/end staff-groupings on this staff. Do not place clef changes etc in this staff - they may trigger the creation of a separate staff on typesetting!
